1.Name: ESTABLISHMENT OF THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE BOARD OF INDIA

paragraphs.1: (2) The Board shall be a body corporate by the name aforesaid, having perpetual succession and a common seal, with power subject to the provisions of this Act, to acquire, hold and dispose of property, both movable and immovable, and to contract, and shall, by the said name, sue or be sued.
paragraphs.2: (3) The head office of the Board shall be at Bombay.
paragraphs.3: (4) The Board may establish offices at other places in India.
